item.content:encoded:
Kentucky Pre-Launch: Get $100 in Bonus Bets on Launch Day!

BetMGM Kentucky bonus code offer for all MLB, NFL, and College Football bettors allows new bettors in Kentucky to join the action by grabbing up to $100 in bonus bets on Winners and Whiners.

Check out now the best Kentucky sportsbook promos to place a bet on the Louisville Cardinals, Kentucky State, or Western Kentucky this weekend.

Key College Football Matchups of the Week:

  • Murray State at Louisville
    Date: Thursday, Sept. 7, 2023
    Time: 7:30pm EST
  • Eastern Kentucky at Kentucky
    Date: Saturday, Sept. 9, 2023
    Time: 3:00 PM EST
  • Houston Christian at Western Kentucky
    Date: Saturday, Sept. 9, 2023
    Time: 7:00 PM EST

How does the BetMGM Kentucky Bonus Code offer work?

A lot of bettors hear about bonuses, but how does it work? How can this bonus help you as a player?

*For example, if you win your first wager at BetMGM, you get to keep the bet and the profit. It will then become withdrawable cash.

*What happens if I lose my first bet? Your account will be credited with bonus bets which are equal to the amount you wagered. However, if you want to see the full $100 back in bonus bets, you are required to deposit and bet the max of $100. If you deposit and wager just $100 and it fails to win, you’ve accumulated $100 in bonus bets.

So even if you lose, you win! You’ll get a refund in bonus bets equal to whatever you lost, up to $100. Remember that you must use the bonus code WINNERS to claim this offer.

If you are looking to make some money TODAY, check out the picks from HOTTEST CAPPERS in the sports betting industry.

Today’s feature Capper is Mason Folz who is on a RIDICULOUS 21-3 Best Bet Run! Snag his Terrific Tuesday MLB Best Bet for Just $29.

What does the BetMGM Bonus Code mean?

The BetMGM Bonus Code is entitled “WINNERS”, which gets you $100 in Bonus Bets as a new customer.

BetMGM’s “refer a friend” bonus is another option where you can increase your bankroll without placing a bet. You can refer up to 20 friends and each time when one of your friends signs up with BetMGM, both of you will receive $50 in bonus bets.

For you to claim your bonus, your friend will need to make their first deposit and place the $50 of their bonus.

Checkout winnersandwhiners.com/betting, where you can see all the current promotions and offers for new users at the top sportsbooks. Winners and Whiners offers all the latest sports gambling news, and predictions for all games from the major sports. Being a profitable sports gambler does not happen by chance. It takes research, insight, and diligence to find the best odds and resources to become successful.  

Kentucky Pre-Launch: Get $100 in Bonus Bets on Launch Day!

Claim Offer

 

Lock in your NFL, College Football and MLB bets today with BetMGM. This reputable sportsbook has an amazing offer for new bettors to grow their bankroll immediately! Make sure you do not miss out on all the Kentucky prelaunch offers that expire on September 28th.

 

BetMGM’s Promotion T&C’s: 21+. Gambling problem? Call 1-800-GAMBLER. AZ, CO, IA, IL, IN, LA, MA, MD, MI, NJ, TN, PA, OH, VA, WV, WY. Call 877-8-HOPENY or text HOPENY (467369) (NY). Call 1-800-327-5050 (MA). 21+ to wager. Please Gamble Responsibly. Call 1-800-NEXT-STEP (AZ), 1-800-522-4700 (KS, NV), 1-800-BETS-OFF (IA), 1-800-270-7117 for confidential help (MI). Visit BetMGM.com for Terms & Conditions. US promotional offers are not available in DC, Nevada, New York or Ontario.

item.content:encoded:
BetMGM Bonus Code – WHINERS Up to $1,500 First Bet Offer for Tuesday

BetMGM bonus code offer for all MLB, NFL, and College Football bettors allows new bettors to grasp up to $1,500 in bonus bets. Even if you lose, you win! You’ll get a refund in bonus bets equal to whatever you lost, up to $1,000. Remember that you must use the bonus code WINNERS to claim this offer.

The slate on Tuesday is baseball-centric, but if you are interested in betting on other sports, BetMGM has options and offers of your choosing. Follow this link to start and use the BetMGM bonus code of WINNERS when signing up.

How do I get the BetMGM bonus offer for Tuesday?

Check out our players today from the HOTTEST CAPPERS in the sports betting industry. Winners and Whiners also has free picks on all the MLB games on today’s slate!

How does the BetMGM Bonus offer work?

A lot of bettors hear about bonuses, but how does it work? How can this bonus help you as a player?

*For example, if you win your first wager at BetMGM, you get to keep the bet and the profit. It will then become withdrawable cash.

*What happens if I lose my first bet? Your account will be credited with bonus bets which are equal to the amount you wagered. However, if you want to see the full $1,000 back in bonus bets, you are required to deposit and bet the max of $1,000. If you deposit and wager just $100 and it fails to win, you’ve accumulated $100 in bonus bets. If you deposit and bet $500 and it loses, you would receive $500 back in bonus bets. The same applies to any amount.

What does the BetMGM bonus code mean?

The BetMGM Bonus Code is entitled “WINNERS”, which gets you a $1000 first bet offer as a new customer.

You can make more by Referring a Frend with BetMGM

BetMGM’s “refer a friend” bonus is another option where you can increase your bankroll without placing a bet. You can refer up to 20 friends and each time when one of your friends signs up with BetMGM, both of you will receive $50 in bonus bets.

For you to claim your bonus, your friend will need to make their first deposit and place the $50 of their bonus.

When looking to sign up for a new sportsbook, check out winnersandwhiners.com/betting, where you can see all the current promotions and offers for new users at the top sportsbooks. You’ll get a refund in bonus bets equal to whatever you lost, up to $1,000. Remember that you must use the bonus code WINNERS to claim this offer.
